issue.title: [Rust] Parquet/Arrow Integration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4059](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4059). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is the umbrella JIRA for implementing Parquet/Arrow integration.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4059?focusedCommentId=16993757) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
`[~liurenjie1024]`  do you still have any more sub-tasks to add? We could tackle write support separately in future versions.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4059?focusedCommentId=16994052) by Renjie Liu (liurenjie1024):*
[~nevi_me] No, we can close this now.
